About Us

My name is Eric Lin and my partner in crime is No. As we explore the instricacies of life, we have come in contact with lifestyles from all over the world. After trying it ourselves we have found the need to share these dicoveries with you, our beloved readers. Now is the time to start your sigma male grindset!
